snippet: A selection of self-portraits taken by Ms. Nicks from 1975 to 1987 will go on display at the Morrison Hotel Gallery in New York.
abstract: A selection of self-portraits taken by Ms. Nicks from 1975 to 1987 will go on display at the Morrison Hotel Gallery in New York.

headline.main: A Show of Stevie Nicks Portraits by Stevie Nicks
